channel.title: Dplyr on Learining R world
channel.description: Recent content in Dplyr on Learining R world

item.title: Creating an Article with Sweave
item.description: How to create an Article using Sweave To start with Sweave, go to 1. Files 2. New Files 3. R Sweave And you will be presented with a new file(rnw) with the headers. To run the file click on “Compile PDF” and the article will be published in pdf format. Note : go to Tools - Global Options - Sweave Make sure the option “Weave RNW file using” has “kniter” selected and click apply.
